title: Gabrielle Bluestone
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with author, journalist, lawyer, and Emmy nominated producer Gabrielle Bluestone. They discuss her book Hype, how social media preys on our emotions, and the art of the con.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
